description: kneeling woman wearing long dress with long sleeves and headscarf, holding a bag (?) open with her hands and mouth; woman looks up
dimension:
11 5/8 x 7 3/4 in. (29.5 x 19.7 cm) (sheet, irregular)
22 7/16 x 18 7/16 in. (56.99 x 46.83 cm) (outer frame)
markings:
Watermark: (?crown), partially obscured
on backing board, on label: [EX. 2006.4.9 / Dr. Alfred Moir]
medium: Black and white chalk on faded blue paper
provenance: Art market, London; [Pietro Scarpa, Venice, by 1978-1979; sold for $4,500 to Moir]; Alfred Moir, Santa Barbara (1979-d. 2010; bequeathed to MIA)
title: Kneeling Woman, Study for Judith's Servant
